mapper.select:
WITH RANGES AS ( SELECT '2500-2999' AS SAL_AVG_RANGE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '3000-3499' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '3500-3999' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '4000-4499' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '4500-4999' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '5000-5499' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '5500-5999' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '6000 이상' FROM DUAL ), DATA AS ( SELECT COUNT(C_NO) AS COUNT_C_NO, CASE
WHEN SAL_AVG >= 2500 AND SAL_AVG < 3000 THEN '2500-2999' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 3000 AND SAL_AVG < 3500 THEN '3000-3499' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 3500 AND SAL_AVG < 4000 THEN '3500-3999' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 4000 AND SAL_AVG < 4500 THEN '4000-4499' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 4500 AND SAL_AVG < 5000 THEN '4500-4999' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 5000 AND SAL_AVG < 5500 THEN '5000-5499' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 5500 AND SAL_AVG < 6000 THEN '5500-5999' ELSE '6000 이상'
END AS SAL_AVG_RANGE FROM COMPANY_INFO GROUP BY CASE
WHEN SAL_AVG >= 2500 AND SAL_AVG < 3000 THEN '2500-2999' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 3000 AND SAL_AVG < 3500 THEN '3000-3499' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 3500 AND SAL_AVG < 4000 THEN '3500-3999' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 4000 AND SAL_AVG < 4500 THEN '4000-4499' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 4500 AND SAL_AVG < 5000 THEN '4500-4999' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 5000 AND SAL_AVG < 5500 THEN '5000-5499' WHEN SAL_AVG >= 5500 AND SAL_AVG < 6000 THEN '5500-5999' ELSE '6000 이상'
END ) SELECT R.SAL_AVG_RANGE, COALESCE(D.COUNT_C_NO, 0) AS COUNT_C_NO FROM RANGES R LEFT JOIN DATA D ON R.SAL_AVG_RANGE = D.SAL_AVG_RANGE ORDER BY R.SAL_AVG_RANGE

SELECT c.field_name, COUNT(DISTINCT i.c_no) AS company_count, COUNT(DISTINCT g.c_no) AS gonggo_count FROM code_field c LEFT JOIN company_info i ON c.field_code = i.field_code LEFT JOIN company_mem m ON i.c_no = m.c_no LEFT JOIN gonggo g ON m.c_no = g.c_no GROUP BY c.field_code, c.field_name ORDER BY c.field_code

)

RNUM >= 1 and RNUM <=5

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(addr, 1, 2) = '서울' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count_seoul, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(addr, 1, 2) = '부산' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count_busan, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(addr, 1, 2) = '인천' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count_incheon, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(addr, 1, 2) = '경기' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count_gyeonggi, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(addr, 1, 2) = '강원' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count_gangwon FROM company_info

WITH SALARY_RANGES AS ( SELECT '2000-2499' AS SALARY_RANGE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '2500-2999' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '3000-3499' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '3500-3999' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '4000-4499' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '4500-4999' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '5000-5499' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '5500-5999' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '6000 이상' FROM DUAL ), SALARY_DATA AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 2000 AND 2499 THEN '2000-2499' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 2500 AND 2999 THEN '2500-2999' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 3000 AND 3499 THEN '3000-3499' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 3500 AND 3999 THEN '3500-3999' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 4000 AND 4499 THEN '4000-4499' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 4500 AND 4999 THEN '4500-4999' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 5000 AND 5499 THEN '5000-5499' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 5500 AND 5999 THEN '5500-5999' ELSE '6000 이상' END AS SALARY_RANGE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT_HOPE_SALARY FROM resume GROUP BY CASE WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 2000 AND 2499 THEN '2000-2499' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 2500 AND 2999 THEN '2500-2999' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 3000 AND 3499 THEN '3000-3499' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 3500 AND 3999 THEN '3500-3999' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 4000 AND 4499 THEN '4000-4499' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 4500 AND 4999 THEN '4500-4999' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 5000 AND 5499 THEN '5000-5499' WHEN hope_salary BETWEEN 5500 AND 5999 THEN '5500-5999' ELSE '6000 이상' END ) SELECT SR.SALARY_RANGE, COALESCE(SD.COUNT_HOPE_SALARY, 0) AS HOPE_CNT FROM SALARY_RANGES SR LEFT JOIN SALARY_DATA SD ON SR.SALARY_RANGE = SD.SALARY_RANGE ORDER BY SR.SALARY_RANGE

select count(distinct a.c_no) as apply_cnt, count(distinct p.p_no) as hope_cnt, c.field_name as field_name, c.field_code as field_code from code_field c left join company_info i on c.field_code = i.field_code left join pertocom a on i.c_no = a.c_no left join person_mem p on c.field_code = p.field_code group by c.field_name, c.field_code order by c.field_code

SELECT COALESCE(cm.month, pm.month) AS month, cm.count AS company_count, pm.count AS person_count FROM (SELECT to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM company_mem GROUP BY to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM')) cm FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM person_mem GROUP BY to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM')) pm ON cm.month = pm.month ORDER BY COALESCE(cm.month, pm.month)
